SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.interfaces

Interface VirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiServer
public interface VirtualServer extends Remote
Defines the methods that the RmiServer should implement. Extends the Remote interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    connect(VirtualClient client, String username, Integer tempToken, Integer token)
    Invokes the Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer) method.
    int

    Invokes the Controller.generateToken(VirtualClient) method.
    String

    Finds and return the IP of the VirtualClient.
    void
    RMIserverWrite(String text)
    Writes a specific String with a formatted prefix indicating the RmiServer.
    void
    sendCommand(ServerQueueObject obj)
    This method adds to the RmiServer the ServerQueueObject received as a parameter.

  • Method Details

    • RMIserverWrite

      void RMIserverWrite(String text) throws RemoteException
      Writes a specific String with a formatted prefix indicating the RmiServer. The format is done by the ServerLog.rmiWrite(String) method.
      Parameters:
      text - is the String to write.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • sendCommand

      void sendCommand(ServerQueueObject obj) throws RemoteException
      This method adds to the RmiServer the ServerQueueObject received as a parameter. Periodically a poll is executed on the list by the private method executor and the ServerQueueObject is executed. This method is invoked only by the RmiClient.setUsernameCall(String) method.
      Parameters:
      obj - is the ServerQueueObject that needs to be added in the List of the RmiServer.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • getClientIP

      String getClientIP() throws RemoteException
      Finds and return the IP of the VirtualClient. If the RemoteServer.getClientHost() method fail a ServerNotActiveException is caught.
      Returns:
      the IP value if the RemoteServer.getClientHost() method is able to find it.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • generateToken

      int generateToken(VirtualClient client) throws RemoteException
      Invokes the Controller.generateToken(VirtualClient) method. The value of the token generated by the Controller is returned. Is invoked only by the RmiClient(String) method.
      Parameters:
      client - is the reference to the VirtualClient
      Returns:
      the value of the token generated by the Controller
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • connect

      boolean connect(VirtualClient client, String username, Integer tempToken, Integer token) throws RemoteException
      Invokes the Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer) method. Based on the result of that method a boolean value is returned. If the Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer) method terminates correctly the value returned is true, false otherwise. Typically, the Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer) method return false if the username of the user was already taken.
      Parameters:
      client - is the reference of the VirtualClient that is trying to connect to the Server.
      username - is the username wanted by the user.
      tempToken - is the value of the Token tempToken private value.
      token - is the value of the Token token private value.
      Returns:
      true if the VirtualClient is connected with the Server, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.
